text.tspan: Share of global COâ‚‚ emissions vs. share of population, 2023
This measures fossil fuel and industry emissions. Land-use change is not included.
Data source: Global Carbon Budget (2024); World Bank (2024); HYDE (2023); Gapminder (2022); UN WPP (2024)
